meanings.definition: The quality of being shiny or reflective.
meanings.sent1: The glossiness of the polished mirror made it perfect for reflecting light.
meanings.sent2: I love the glossiness of freshly waxed floors.
meanings.sent3: The glossiness of the bald man's head made him look like a human mirrorball.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with the glossiness of a crystal-clear lake.
meanings.sent5: The glossiness of the car's paint job was so intense, it almost blinded me.

meanings.sent1: The glossy glossiness of the new shoes caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The glossiness of the marble countertop made it easy to clean.
meanings.sent3: The glossiness of the banana peel made it look like a slippery slide.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a glossiness that lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The glossiness of the wet paint made the room feel brand new.

meanings.definition: The state of having a glossy finish.
meanings.sent1: The glossiness of the magazine cover made it stand out on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The glossiness of the photo paper enhanced the colors of the image.
meanings.sent3: The glossiness of the ice rink made it a challenge to skate on.
meanings.sent4: The glossiness of the trophy symbolized the team's victory.
meanings.sent5: The glossiness of the freshly printed book made it inviting to read.
